p: In this respect, numerous studies, using rosemary leaves extract, containing rich fractions of polyphenols, have reported positive effects on frozen semen in several species including boar [ 28], dog [ 29], and ram [ 30]. However, no protective effect was reported when using R. officinalis essential oil, and recently, Elmi et al. [ 31] observed similar motilities when comparing the control to sperm treated in vitro with 0.2 mg/ml of R. officinalis essential oil. Overall, all the reported data independently on the considered plant showed an obvious spermicidal activity.
